childMarkdownRemark.html: This is not a real shop! Historic field watches were designed to meet three basic requirements for military troops - rugged reliability, precise accuracy, and outstanding legibility. This smaller version of the Filson Field Watch is engineered to meet those same criteria, so you can absolutely depend on it in the field. The precise quartz movement is housed in a stainless steel case with a screw-down crown, and the sapphire crystal provides a virtually scratchproof window to the luminous hands and markers.
